classification_data.text: A member firm of Ernst & Young Global Limited Ernst & Young Audit S.A.S. Ernst & Young Audit S.A.S. Ernst & Young Audit S.A.S. Ernst & Young Audit S.A.S. Bogotá D.C. Medellín – Antioquia Cali – Valle del Cauca Barranquilla - Atlántico Carrera 11 No 98 - 07 Carrera 43A No. 3 Sur-130 Avenida 4 Norte No. 6N – 61 Calle 77B No 59 – 61 Edificio Pijao Green Office Edificio Milla de Oro Edificio Siglo XXI Edificio Centro Empresarial Tercer Piso Torre 1 – Piso 14 Oficina 502 Las Américas II Oficina 311 Tel. +57 (601) 484 7000 Tel: +57 (604) 369 8400 Tel: +57 (602) 485 6280 Tel: +57 (605) 385 2201 Señores Siemens Sociedad por Acciones Simplificada. Bogotá, D.C. He auditado, de acuerdo con las normas de auditoría aplicables según el Decreto 2420 de 2015 y modificatorios, los estados financieros terminados al 31 de diciembre de 2022, no incluidos aquí, de Siemens S.A.S., identificada con NIT. 860.031.028-9. Así mismo, he desarrollado los procedimientos necesarios para cumplir con mis funciones como Revisor Fiscal. Los registros contables al 31 de mayo de 2023, no auditados, de la cuenta 3105 "capital suscrito y pagado", y el libro de registro de accionistas, reflejan la siguiente composición: NIT Accionistas N° Acciones (*) Valor en pesos colombianos Participación % NL001781029B01 Siemens International Holding B.V. 5,468,220 $95,693,850,000 100% 5,468,220 $95,693,850,000 100% (*) El valor nominal de cada acción es de $17,500. La información financiera y contable es responsabilidad de la Gerencia de la Compañía. Con base en los procedimientos ejecutados a la fecha, no estoy enterado de situaciones que impliquen cambios significativos a la información anteriormente indicada. Esta certificación se expide por solicitud de la Compañía, y no debe ser utilizada para ningún otro propósito. Brayan Stiven Reyes Junco Revisor Fiscal Tarjeta Profesional 257646 -T Designado por Ernst & Young Audit S.A.S. TR-530 Bogotá, D.C. 7 de junio de 2023

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document by following the classification workflow: 1. TEXT EXTRACTION The document appears to be a certification letter from Ernst & Young Audit S.A.S. regarding Siemens Sociedad por Acciones Simplificada. It contains information about the company's shareholding structure. The document is dated June 7, 2023 and is signed by Brayan Stiven Reyes Junco, who is identified as the "Revisor Fiscal" (Statutory Auditor). The document contains details about the company's capital structure, showing that Siemens International Holding B.V. owns 5,468,220 shares, representing 100% ownership, with a total value of 95,693,850,000 Colombian pesos. Each share has a nominal value of 17,500 pesos. 2. PRIORITY CHECKS - Not BLANK: The document has substantial content - Not LINK_ONLY: There are no hyperlinks as the main content 3. ISSUER IDENTIFICATION The document is issued by Ernst & Young Audit S.A.S. (specifically by Brayan Stiven Reyes Junco, a Revisor Fiscal/Statutory Auditor). It's not issued by DIAN or a Chamber of Commerce. 4. DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS This document appears to function as a certification of the ownership structure of Siemens S.A.S. It specifically states the capital composition ("composición") of the company, listing the sole shareholder (Siemens International Holding B.V.) with the number of shares, value, and participation percentage. 5. CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION This document most closely matches the ACC (Shareholding Structure) category: - It contains shareholder terminology: "accionistas", "N° Acciones", "Participación %" - It provides ownership data: 5,468,220 shares representing 100% ownership - It identifies the owner: Siemens International Holding B.V. - It specifies capital values: 95,693,850,000 Colombian pesos - It's certified by a legal representative (in this case, a Statutory Auditor) The document's primary function is to certify the shareholding structure of Siemens S.A.S., which is precisely what the ACC category is defined to capture. 6. CONFIDENCE VALIDATION Strong evidence for ACC classification: - Clear shareholder listing with ownership percentages - Specific share values and capital contributions - Official certification by a statutory auditor - The document explicitly certifies the composition of the "capital suscrito y pagado" (subscribed and paid capital) - The format is consistent with a shareholder certification document The document does not have the characteristics of: - CERL: Not issued by Chamber of Commerce, doesn't cover corporate history or governance - CECRL: Not a personal identification document - RUT: Not issued by DIAN, no tax registration purposes - RUB: Not focused on beneficial ownership for regulatory compliance Therefore, I'm confident in classifying this as ACC.
